data.text: Haah, haa… haaah…
data.name: Admire Vega

data.text:
I'm not finished yet. 
I… I need to run more.
data.name: Admire Vega

data.text: It has been a few days since I became her trainer.

choices.text: I'm still a little soft with her, so…

data.text:
I'm currently taking notes on how Admire Vega runs. 
I will use this as a basis for her training going forward, but…
Will she actually listen to me?

She does listen to light advice, but when it 
comes to training that requires us to work together…

I'm… fine being alone. 
I… prefer being alone.
data.name: Admire Vega

data.text:
If I don't have a trainer, I won't be able to enter the 
Twinkle Series. So either way, I'd need one eventually…
data.name: Admire Vega

data.text:
It's hard to get her to do training 
that requires her to cooperate with me…

I am her trainer. I told her that I would support 
her no matter what, so I have to prove that to―
I'm going to run somewhere else…
data.name: Admire Vega

data.text: Don't… wait for me.
data.name: Admire Vega

data.text:
She ran off before I had a chance to react. 
I wanted to chase after her, but she was just too quick.
Hahh, hah, haa…!
data.name: Admire Vega

data.text: It's fine, I can still run much more today. If I continue at this pace, one day I'll reach those far away stars, all by myself.
data.name: Admire Vega

data.text: All… by myself.
data.name: Admire Vega

data.text:
I was so busy organizing my notes 
that I didn't realize it was already nighttime.

choices.text: But there's only a little left to do…

data.text:
I hope I can get my feelings across to Admire Vega 
tomorrow. And I hope that I can be useful to her too.
You're here again.
data.name: Admire Vega

data.text:
Trainer-san, you'll catch a cold if you 
continue to sleep here. You should go home.
data.name: Admire Vega

data.text: And you left your computer on, and these notes…
data.name: Admire Vega

data.text:
"She seems to like stars." "Should I change 
the training start time?" "Where's a good area 
to stargaze?" "I'll ask Tazuna about it."
"She's doing this for 'her'?"
"What else can I do for her?"
data.name: Admire Vega

data.text:
Why is she… doing all of this? I told her so 
many times… that I prefer doing things alone.
data.name: Admire Vega

data.text: I thought that all I wanted was to see the stars. That all I wanted was to continue running, until I reached that faraway place.
data.name: Admire Vega

data.text: But…
data.name: Admire Vega

data.text: She's definitely waiting for you.

No… that isn't true. The only reason I 
came back was because of my curfew. That's it.
data.name: Admire Vega

data.text:
All the effort you're putting into me… 
I don't deserve it.
data.name: Admire Vega

data.text: There's a different Uma Musume that deserved all of this. The one who was meant to shine like a dazzling star.
data.name: Admire Vega

data.text: My… beloved sister.
data.name: Admire Vega

data.text:
It seems like someone covered me in a blanket. I didn't open my 
eyes, but in my sleep I could hear the faint sounds of footsteps.
